Description:
Responsibilities:Responsible for the review of mechanical design contents as assigned together with its follow-up for Authority and Client's approval.
Responsibilities include mechanical drainage, water supply, gas, HVAC, fire protection and as well as other related mechanical utility systems.
Responsible for the preparation and review of mechanical design calculations, drawings, specifications, and tender documents for the design projects.
Responsible for participation in the progress and coordination meetings of the design projects and the preparation of the meeting records.
Liaison and coordination with all applicable Local Authority Departments to obtain approval on design projects.
Review of works produced by the mechanical engineers and the necessary coordination with other Atkins discipline Engineers as applicable for the continuity of the design projects.Rewards & Benefits:A competitive salary will be offered to the right candidate
Accommodation allowance
Transportation allowance
26 working days annual leave.
Medical and life insurance cover
Company gratuity scheme
Discretionary bonus scheme
Annual return airfare to point of originSkills
Skills:
Full-time degree qualified in Mechanical Engineering or similar from a reputed university.
A minimum of 11 plus years’ in the capacity of for a Mechanical Engineer and 15 plus years’ in the capacity of for a Senior Mechanical Engineer site supervision experience of working in Mechanical Building Services Engineering involving HVAC, Controls, Plumbing, PHE, Fire.
Awareness of variety of concept, scheme and construction design schemes in a number of different sectors.
Ability to adapt to different cultures and working environments to build rapport with customers
Experience of using written and spoken English within a business environment
